name: SUSHIDO VS ZOMBIES
description: NINJA×SUSHI×ZOMBI, a new spin on the classic Sushi Ninja Action genre. Throw sushi like ninja stars to protect your shop from the approaching zombies.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
